SELECT * FROM movie AS M WHERE 1
AND M.boardId = #{boardId}
AND M.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')
AND M.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')
AND (M.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') OR M.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%'))
ORDER BY M.id DESC
